meanings.sent1: The tonier dress caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses the tonier outfits for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked tonier than usual with its new bow tie.
meanings.sent4: The tonier decor of the room made it feel like a royal palace.
meanings.sent5: Her tonier taste in fashion inspired others to upgrade their wardrobes.

meanings.definition: More elegant or sophisticated than something else
meanings.sent1: The tonier restaurant in town is known for its exquisite cuisine.
meanings.sent2: His tonier manners impressed the guests at the dinner party.
meanings.sent3: The tonier car stood out among the ordinary vehicles on the street.
meanings.sent4: Her tonier vocabulary made her essays stand out in class.
meanings.sent5: The tonier neighborhood exuded an air of exclusivity and refinement.
